      • getInstance

        public static InLocoMediaOptions getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the last used InLocoMediaOptions. This method will recover all parameters of the last instance of InLocoMediaOptions, if you need a clean InLocoMediaOptions use the newInstance(Context) method instead of this.
        Returns:
        The last used InLocoMediaOptions.
        See Also:
        newInstance(Context)
